Translations.Text: O prophet dictus to tuus uxor vos seeking hoc vita its vanities tunc let me compensate vos allow vos iit amicably
Si vos seeking DEUS His messenger abode Hereafter tunc DEUS prepared righteous vos major recompense
O uxor prophet si any de vos commits gross sin retribution doubled eam! Hoc est easy DEUS perfecit
Any unus de vos obeys DEUS His messenger leads righteous vita nos grant eam double recompense nos prepared eam generous provision

O uxor de prophet vos est same prout any alius femina si vos observe righteousness! (Vos habet major responsibility.) Ergo vos non speak too softly lest those morbus in their hearts get wrong ideas; vos speak unus righteousness

Vos settle down tuus domus perfecit non mingle people excessively vos used perfecit in veteris feria ignorance! Vos observe Contact Prayers (Salat) dedit obligatory charity (Zakat) obey DEUS His messenger! DEUS wishes remove TOTUS unholiness EX VOS O VOS vivens SANCTUS Shrine purify VOS completely
Remember quod recited tuus domus de deus revelations wisdom inherent therein! DEUS EST Sublime Cognizant
